body.name: Honey-Can-Do Kids Nesting Table and Chairs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 10 mins.
features: A two-in-one design, kids table & chair set doubles as a compact storage unit
Chairs have built in compartments to hold toys, art supplies, books and more
Chairs conveniently nest under table when not in use
Weight capacity: 50lbs per chair, 30 lbs for table
Dimensions: Table 21.7" x 21.7" x 19.7"H; Chairs 14.6"L x 10.2"W x 10.6"H
body.description: Take an afternoon break with this kids table and 4-chair set. Whether it's playtime with others or quiet time, this set is the perfect place to sit down and draw or play a game. The chairs nest inside the table, maximizing space in a kids room or playroom, and the color combo fits with any design aesthetic.

productInformation.name: Warranty Description
productInformation.value: Honey-can-do international, llc (hcd) warrants its products will be free from defects in materials and workmanship when used for normal personal or household use, except as provided below. Within 60 days of purchase, and with proof of purchase, hcd, at its option, may offer a comparable product or offer a replacement part or request that the item be returned to the place of purchase. This warranty does not apply to damage caused by negligence, misuse, excessive use, improper cleaning, improper assembly, or any circumstance not directly attributable to manufacturing defects. Proof of purchase is required in the form of a receipt (copy or original) and proof of damage may be requested to validate warranty. Hcd provides this warranty in lieu of all other warranties either expressed or implied. In no event shall hcd, its affiliates, or subsidiaries be responsible for consequential or incidental damages arising out of a claim of defective product. Some states or provinces do not allow some exclusions or limitations, so the above statement may not apply to you. This warranty gives you specific legal rights, and you may also have other rights, which vary by state or province.

ORGANIZE ANYWHERE Product Categories Shelving & Racks Closet & Shoe Storage Kitchen Organization Bathroom Storage, and more Yes, But Who Are You? Honey-Can-Do was founded in 2008 and is comprised of a dedicated team whose focus is to bring solutions to people's homes. Oh, and we also have a no-jerks-allowed policy at our company, so it makes our lives easier as we try to make your lives easier. About Us Unlock Your Surroundings At Honey-Can-Do, we believe an organized space unlocks your surroundings for living, bolstering the form and function of everything within a space’s four walls. Everyday Household Solutions We like to find customers solutions for their entire home. We’re about decluttering an entryway, breathing new life into closets and wardrobes, making it easy to set up after-school snacks, and filling a living space with charm and character unique to each homeowner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little table
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put together. Works great as an addition to our play room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't eager to haul this to the baby's room, but it's worth it-- even though he isn't even sitting up yet. It's an excellent table and chair set but doubles as an interesting toy shelf and table top right now. Plus, it gives us a place to sit if we're in the room with him.It's got four stools, so it's really for toddler age kids that are walking and sitting without help, but can finally sit on a stool alone and work at a table. It can seat four-- and the colors are beautiful primary colors, though I may paint the stools to go with the room. Not sure. I did add some contact paper to the top to protect the table top for a while. It will remove easily enough, not worried about removing paint, since I got the low adhesive kind.It holds a ton of toys, stuffed animals, a few board books.On the table, I can keep the lamp and some incidentals. Maybe a clock. I might put the table next to the feeding chair, so I can also use it to rest the bottle.Thrilled with the table. Great item. Really well made, strong and the finish is solid-- nothing was chipped, everything arrived in perfect condition. Didn't take too long to put together. I had it done in an hour or so alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is great as a homeschool, preschool, or daycare table and chairs. I love how everything stacks together nicely, and the seats have storage for books, backpacks, etc. It was a breeze to assemble, and it's very sturdy and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Just a little smaller than I hoped for but it beautiful and it has areas to store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works fine, but cheap
reviews.reviewText: This set works, but IKEA or others are better bang for the buck. I was disappointed in a few different areas, but most of all it just kinda feels cheap.Things I like:-Compact. Nice how chairs fit snuggly into the desk.Things I don't like:-Feels cheap and wobbly, more so than most particle board furniture.-Assembly was more difficult than I think it needed to be. I've done lots of these (like anyone else) but was surprised how many pieces there were.-Lots of chips and scrapes after the first few weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great product, fast shipping, but difficult to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute, looks great in playroom
reviews.reviewText: This is a great addition to my kids play area. The colors on the stools make it really stand out and become a focal point.In our play room we have a play kitchen and store so it's great to have a table to pretend to eat at. This is also good for coloring or reading. It's a bit higher than a typical children's table, almost like a little high top. The stools are easy to move around and push close to the table when not in use to maximize space.The assembly instructions weren't difficult but it was a lot of screwing so a power drill really helps. The material is MDF so we'll see how it holds up. The surfaces wipe clean easily.I was interested in this partly for storage in the stools but I'm realizing that's not very practical. Yes the stools are open but I can't see fitting much in there, maybe stuffed animals? I like the concept but not sure it works with this design.Overall it's a very adorable table for your little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I really like this table and chairs set. My favorite part is that the seats tuck back into the table when my kids are done playing with it. I like the bright fun colors, but that they are also not the typical colors. It does look a little cheap, but I don't mind that for the price and knowing that kids will color on it any ways so I wouldn't want to buy something too nice. This works perfect for the ages they are now.
